title: Am I Dumb Or...
body:
I play Katarina every once in a while, and I've made this mistake more than once.

I go to ward hop over a wall, and after dropping the ward I think to myself "I can't ward hop if I don't have vision of the ward" and drop a second ward. Immediately after, I get kinda disappointed in myself.

replies.body: I always sweeper bushes with pinks in them and think to myself "im doen it wrong".

> [{quoted}](name=Section 9,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=M2AEWvbU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-25T02:56:32.403+0000)
>
> I always sweeper bushes with pinks in them and think to myself "im doen it wrong".

I quite often do that and find another ward there. In fact more often than not i believe.

> [{quoted}](name=Section 9,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=M2AEWvbU,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-11-25T21:02:33.673+0000)
>
> I mean allied pinks lol.

niceeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
